TopicTitle: POLL What do you want to see added? (Multiple Choice)

Articles.Content:
Which on eve is your favourite?

P.S. Pulled these from the suggested list

Edited August 3, 2018 by Cheif Operations Director
Well they made working parachutes, so I still dont see why tethers would be too much to ask for. (It even has the same concept... Keeps your kerbals alive?)
Parachutes dont help if you get lost in space

On 8/12/2018 at 7:06 AM, James M said:

Well they made working parachutes, so I still dont see why tethers would be too much to ask for. (It even has the same concept... Keeps your kerbals alive?)

 

You have the jetpack, so the tether isn't essential. And while a really simple implementation, similar to KAS winches wouldn't be that hard, if the developers attempt to model proper rope physics with wrapping, catching on obstacles, flexibility etc, forget any other updates for a year. The reward is really not worth the cost.
What if it isnt on the list?
A career system that doesn't suck needs to be on there.
I think the Mk3 Cargo bay with fuel is a cool idea. I wonder if it could be done with Mk2 bays too.

enhanced IVA 

possibly redo ksp in UE4 engine with survival,crafting,multiplayer. (if i can make a survival game with no coding skills using multiplayer templates with voxel terrain and getting ideas from youtube then i know a group of coders could easily do it. Procedural Quad tree spheres and procedural terrains ARE do-able in UE4)
